Atominvest for Gmail

Atominvest's software enables asset managers across private equity, venture capital, credit, real estate and hedge funds to manage contacts, investors, deals and portfolio companies within a single tool. 

Our software streamlines collaboration and delivers an integrated, single source-of-truth across all core fund management activities.

By licencing Atominvest, you can leverage our Google Chrome & Gmail extension to manage your relationships, deal flow, and investors from the comfort of your Gmail inbox.

Note: The add-in is free to download. To use the add-in, you will need an active licence /  subscription of Atominvest.

ABOUT ATOMINVEST

Atominvest provides modern software for the asset management and private markets industry. We provide front-to-back office solutions across deal, portfolio & ESG management and investor relations, reporting and onboarding. 

For more information or to request a demo, please visit https://www.atominvest.co/.
